dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of 3 point clouds of arbitrary size, each generated from a 2-dimensional Gaussian mixture model with 5 components having different means and covariance matrices. A 20-nearest neighbor graph is built on each point cloud.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset

dcterms:creator: M. El Gheche
P. Frossard
dcterms:description: A subset of the 20 Newsgroup dataset consisting of 500 documents, pre-processed based on text segments, partitioned across 5 different newsgroups corresponding to different topics.
dcterms:title: NGs dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Greene
P. Cunningham
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from the BBC Sport website consisting of 544 documents organized into five sport categories, collected from 2004 to 2005. A multilayer graph is built by connecting documents based on text segments.
dcterms:title: BBC sport dataset
